item.description: Maia Reficco, Fernando Lindez and Eva Longoria also star in the feature based on Anna Todd’s best-selling book.

item.title: ‘Necaxa’ Review: Eva Longoria’s FXX Mexican Soccer Docuseries Lives in the Shadow of ‘Welcome to Wrexham’
item.description: The Ryan Reynolds- and Rob Mac-produced project, which focuses on a struggling squad in Mexico, is one in a recent wave of series about celebrities investing in sports teams.

item.title: ‘The Pickup’ Review: Eddie Murphy and Pete Davidson’s Lively Chemistry Helps Steady Amazon’s Bumpy Heist Comedy
item.description: Keke Palmer and Eva Longoria also star in the latest feature from director Tim Story (‘The Blackening’), about a pair of armored car guards who get ensnared in a deadly pursuit.

item.title: Eva Longoria to Direct Mystery ‘Anita De Monte Laughs Last’ for Searchlight
item.description: Xochitl Gonzalez will adapt her novel about a first-generation Ivy League art student who uncovered a forgotten artist from the 1980s who had a suspicious death.
